bug.author: lastrei
bug.summary: ERROR (nni.msg_dispatcher_base/Thread-1) index 823 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 790
bug.description:
nni Environment: nni version: latest nni mode local OS: windows 10 64bit python version:3.6 is conda or virtualenv used?: yes is running in docker?:no when i run my experiment on nniï¼Œafter 20+ trial it's error and i search for the logs, i see the message below: [01/09/2020, 05:55:34 PM] DEBUG (nni.msg_dispatcher_base/Thread-2) process_command: command: [CommandType.TrialEnd], data: [OrderedDict([('trial_job_id', 'gM4jc'), ('event', 'SUCCEEDED'), ('hyper_params', '{"parameter_id": 23, "parameter_source": "algorithm", "parameters": {"num_leaves": 170, "max_bin": 833, "min_data_in_leaf": 160, "learning_rate": 0.022876755463143227, "lambda_l1": 0.2, "feature_fraction": 0.7524212365076838, "bagging_fraction": 0.9063591484877684, "bagging_freq": 10}, "parameter_index": 0}')])] [01/09/2020, 05:55:34 PM] ERROR (nni.msg_dispatcher_base/Thread-1) index 823 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 790 Traceback (most recent call last): File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni\msg_dispatcher_base.py", line 90, in command_queue_worker self.process_command(command, data) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni\msg_dispatcher_base.py", line 149, in process_command command_handlers<denchmark-link:data>command</denchmark-link>
File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni\msg_dispatcher.py", line 101, in handle_request_trial_jobs params_list = self.tuner.generate_multiple_parameters(ids, st_callback=self.send_trial_callback) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni	uner.py", line 132, in generate_multiple_parameters res = self.generate_parameters(parameter_id, **kwargs) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni\hyperopt_tuner\hyperopt_tuner.py", line 267, in generate_parameters total_params = self.get_suggestion(random_search=False) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages
ni\hyperopt_tuner\hyperopt_tuner.py", line 444, in get_suggestion new_trials = algorithm(new_ids, rval.domain, trials, random_state) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages\hyperopt	pe.py", line 900, in suggest print_node_on_error=False) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages\hyperopt\pyll ase.py", line 913, in rec_eval rval = scope._impls[node.name](*args, **kwargs) File "E:\miniconda\lib\site-packages\hyperopt	pe.py", line 61, in categorical_lpdf return np.log(np.asarray(p)[sample]) IndexError: index 823 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 790 [01/09/2020, 05:55:35 PM] DEBUG (nni.protocol/MainThread) Received command, header: [b'PI000000'] [01/09/2020, 05:55:35 PM] DEBUG (nni.protocol/MainThread) Received command, data: [] [01/09/2020, 05:55:35 PM] INFO (nni.msg_dispatcher_base/MainThread) Dispatcher exiting... [01/09/2020, 05:55:37 PM] INFO (nni.msg_dispatcher_base/MainThread) Terminated by NNI manager the search space is this: { "num_leaves":{"_type":"randint","_value":[60,140]}, "max_bin":{"_type":"randint","_value":[300,600]}, "min_data_in_leaf":{"_type":"randint","_value":[80, 180]}, "learning_rate":{"_type":"uniform","_value":[0.01, 0.03]}, "lambda_l1":{"_type":"choice","_value":[0.2,0.4,0.5,0.7,0.8]}, "feature_fraction":{"_type":"uniform","_value":[0.6, 1.0]}, "bagging_fraction":{"_type":"uniform","_value":[0.6, 1.0]}, "bagging_freq":{"_type":"choice","_value":[1, 2, 4, 8, 10]} } the config_windows is this authorName: default experimentName: example_auto-gbdt trialConcurrency: 1 maxExecDuration: 30h maxTrialNum: 250 #choice: local, remote, pai trainingServicePlatform: local searchSpacePath: search_space.json #choice: true, false useAnnotation: false tuner: #choice: TPE, Random, Anneal, Evolution, BatchTuner, MetisTuner, GPTuner #SMAC (SMAC should be installed through nnictl) builtinTunerName: TPE classArgs: #choice: maximize, minimize optimize_mode: maximize trial: command: python find_para.py codeDir: e:/match/ gpuNum: 0 the code is this import pandas as pd import lightgbm as lgb import logging from sklearn.metrics import f1_score LOG = logging.getLogger('auto-gbdt') def under_fit(df, q): df_0 = df[df.label == 0] df_1 = df[df.label != 0] print(len(df_1)) df_0 = df_0.sample(frac=q, random_state=1) print(len(df_0)) df = pd.concat([df_0, df_1], axis=0) return df from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split def get_default_parameters(): params = { "boosting": "gbdt", 'objective': 'multiclass', 'metric': 'multi_logloss', 'num_class': 5, 'num_leaves': 80, 'learning_rate': 0.02, 'feature_fraction': 0.9, 'bagging_fraction': 0.8, 'bagging_freq': 5, "max_bin": 256, "lambda_l1": 0.1, 'verbose': -1 } return params def load_data(): ----read data from csv and feature works--- return lgb_train, lgb_eval, test_X, test_y import nni def run(lgb_train, lgb_eval, params, test_X, test_y): print('Start training...') params['num_leaves'] = int(params['num_leaves']) # train gbm = lgb.train(params, lgb_train, num_boost_round=1500, valid_sets=lgb_eval, categorical_feature='auto', early_stopping_rounds=5, ) print('Start predicting...') <denchmark-code># predict y_pred = gbm.predict(test_X, num_iteration=gbm.best_iteration) y_pred = [list(x).index(max(x)) for x in y_pred] # eval f1 = f1_score(test_y, y_pred, average='micro') print('The f1 of prediction is:', f1) nni.report_final_result(f1) </denchmark-code>
if name == 'main': lgb_train, lgb_eval, test_X, test_y = load_data() try: # get parameters from tuner RECEIVED_PARAMS = nni.get_next_parameter() LOG.debug(RECEIVED_PARAMS) PARAMS = get_default_parameters() PARAMS.update(RECEIVED_PARAMS) LOG.debug(PARAMS) # train run(lgb_train, lgb_eval, PARAMS, test_X, test_y) except Exception as exception: LOG.exception(exception) raise i don't know how to fix it . some one can help? thanks

comments.comment: and by the way i set the max_bin "max_bin":{"_type":"randint","_value":[300,600]}, but in the log i see this "max_bin": 833, why its >600?

and nnimanager.log is here [2020-1-9 17:55:33] INFO [ 'Trial job gM4jc status changed from RUNNING to SUCCEEDED' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:33] DEBUG [ 'storeTrialJobEvent: event: SUCCEEDED, data: undefined, jobDetail: {"id":"gM4jc","status":"SUCCEEDED","submitTime":1578563503303,"workingDirectory":"C:\Users\hp680\nni\experiments\OHl57N2z\trials\gM4jc","form":{"sequenceId":23,"hyperParameters":{"value":"{"parameter_id": 23, "parameter_source": "algorithm", "parameters": {"num_leaves": 170, "max_bin": 833, "min_data_in_leaf": 160, "learning_rate": 0.022876755463143227, "lambda_l1": 0.2, "feature_fraction": 0.7524212365076838, "bagging_fraction": 0.9063591484877684, "bagging_freq": 10}, "parameter_index": 0}","index":0}},"url":"file://localhost:C:\Users\hp680\nni\experiments\OHl57N2z\trials\gM4jc","gpuIndices":[],"startTime":1578563505772,"pid":21572,"endTime":1578563730048}' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:34] DEBUG [ 'ipcInterface command type: [EN], content:[{"trial_job_id":"gM4jc","event":"SUCCEEDED","hyper_params":"{"parameter_id": 23, "parameter_source": "algorithm", "parameters": {"num_leaves": 170, "max_bin": 833, "min_data_in_leaf": 160, "learning_rate": 0.022876755463143227, "lambda_l1": 0.2, "feature_fraction": 0.7524212365076838, "bagging_fraction": 0.9063591484877684, "bagging_freq": 10}, "parameter_index": 0}"}]' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:34] DEBUG [ 'ipcInterface command type: [GE], content:[1]' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:35] DEBUG [ 'ipcInterface command type: [PI], content:[]' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:40] DEBUG [ 'ipcInterface command type: [PI], content:[]' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:40] ERROR [ 'Dispatcher error: This socket has been ended by the other party' ] [2020-1-9 17:55:40] ERROR [ 'Error: Dispatcher stream error, tuner may have crashed.

Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lastrei>@lastrei</denchmark-link> . Based on the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/nni/blob/master/docs/en_US/Tutorial/SearchSpaceSpec.md>tutorial</denchmark-link> , I think you can use to instead . Because TPE treats integers from lower to upper as unordered ones. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6280746/72120832-35434980-3394-11ea-8676-6a9dcec49a4f.png></denchmark-link>
As for why the max_bin is out of the boundary, I don't have a certain answer now. But could you check the hyperopt version that you are using? thanks.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xuehui1991>@xuehui1991</denchmark-link>
thanks for reply hyperopt. '0.2' the index out of bound error because of randint? i'll use quniform to have a try thank you so much

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lastrei>@lastrei</denchmark-link> for reporting this issue. Currently, NNI only supports hyperopt 0.1.2. Could you try 0.1.2 to check whether the problem still exists. Thank you.

Thanks @lastrei for reporting this issue. Currently, NNI only supports hyperopt 0.1.2. Could you try 0.1.2 to check whether the problem still exists. Thank you.
ok i will change hyperopt to 0.1.2 and i use quniform to instead randint the out of bound error is not appear ..but i don't know why randint can cause out of bound?

Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lastrei>@lastrei</denchmark-link> . I reproduce your error using your search space. I think it a bug happened in the period of code refinement. NNI should fix it asap.
